decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (JSV/87/400, 401, 403, 404, received 29/04/2014, 402A received 11/06/2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - The on-site refuse storage and collection facilities referred to in the approved drawings and supporting documents as part of this permission including the associated secure storage area shall be provided before the development is first brought into use.  The facilities shall be made permanently available and no waste shall be stored outside the provided bin or bins within the site or other than in the designated area.  Non-recyclable and perishable waste shall be removed from site no less frequently than once a week.  Waste shall be removed as soon as the bins become full if this is earlier than the time of the normal collection.
description: Erection of a single storey extension to shop premises
